name: Vegan Cheese Sauce
author: bikepunxx
summary: I got this from a friend back when I was a freegan. I still sometimes make it, and it's always a big hit with everyone. You can use it to make vegan nachos or top pasta.
ingredients: 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
1 pinch ground cumin, or to taste
1 cup water, or more as needed
directions: Combine nutritional yeast, flour, paprika, salt, garlic powder, and cumin in a saucepan; add water
Whisk constantly over medium heat until thick and bubbly, about 5 minutes; remove from heat
Stir margarine into the yeast mixture until melted
Cook and stir over low heat until tomatoes are warmed through, about 5 minutes
